name: Emerald Orb
r1: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 20% for 12s.
r2: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 25% for 12s.
r3: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 30% for 12s.
r4: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 35% for 12s.
r5: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 40% for 12s.
